text: The 2018 Thindown Challenger Biella was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor red clay courts. It was part of the 2018 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Biella, Italy between 17 and 23 September 2018. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Roberto Carballés Baena |94 |1 |- | |Federico Delbonis |100 |2 |- | |Paolo Lorenzi |113 |3 |- | |Thiago Monteiro |117 |4 |- | |Marco Trungelliti |134 |5 |- | |Stefano Travaglia |147 |6 |- | |Gastão Elias |154 |7 |- | |Daniel Gimeno Traver |158 |8 |} * Rankings are as of 10 September 2018. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Enrico Dalla Valle * Paolo Lorenzi * Andrea Pellegrino * Pietro Rondoni The following players received entry into the singles main draw as special exempts: * Facundo Argüello * Alejandro Davidovich Fokina The following player received entry into the singles main draw as an alternate: * Thiago Monteiro The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Marcelo Tomás Barrios Vera * Mathias Bourgue * Alexandre Müller * Jan Šátral The following players received entry as lucky losers: * Oscar José Gutierrez * Juan Pablo Varillas ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Federico Delbonis def. Stefano Napolitano 6–4, 6–3. ===Doubles=== * Fabrício Neis / David Vega Hernández def. Rameez Junaid / Purav Raja 6–4, 6–4. ==External links== *Official website Thindown Challenger Biella Category:Tennis tournaments in Italy
title: 2018 Thindown Challenger Biella
